summary: usain bolt will compete at the iaaf/btc world relays in the bahamas next month , the jamaica athletics administrative association has announced . the six-time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . ` i 'm happy to be part of the jamaican team for the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas .

aspect: 1. Usain Bolt to compete in IAAF/BTC World Relays in Bahamas in May.
2. Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association announces relay championship participation.

explain: Usain Bolt, the six-time Olympic gold medallist sprinter, will participate in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas slated for May 2-3, as a part of the Jamaican team.

In relation to the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas, Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association communicates Usain Bolt's participation in the relay championship as part of the Jamaican team on May 2 and 3.

Bolt expresses his excitement to participate in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas, particularly emphasizing the energy and national pride he will experience in a team event that brings together the best athletes in the world.
